issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: If a user with no CW privileges executes a euwatch command, CLC returns a 500 response which causes euca2ools to keep retrying. I noticed this problem for euwatch-describe-alarms and euwatch-list-metrics, but it might apply to other euwatch commands as well.
fields.summary: 500 response is returned when euwatch commands are executed by an unauthorized user

comments.body:
should be assigning a 403 instead of a 500.
Effect of the bug is the tool appears to hang and eventually gives back an error message.

In euca 4.1.2 this is now returning a 403 error. {code} [mmunn:~]euca -version bash: euca: command not found [mmunn:~]e [mmunn:~]euca-version euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-65-gb4d4d07 (Apollo) eucalyptus 4.1.0 [mmunn:~]euwatch-list-metrics -I AKIK9J8FDLDPNLXCK3CK -S 8XJgeAN231insay0t7YA7SpKULGAjyaaXyUpr27n --debug 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 DEBUG ListMetrics parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'Dimensions.member': None, 'region': None, 'Namespace': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': 'AKIK9J8FDLDPNLXCK3CK', 'secret_key': , 'MetricName': None} 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 INFO Config novalue for default-region 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-06-17 07:30:22,003 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-06-17 07:30:22,006 INFO ListMetrics parameters: {'Action': 'ListMetrics', 'Version': '2010-08-01'} 2015-06-17 07:30:22,007 INFO CloudWatch sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-06-17 07:30:22,007 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.5.63:8773\n/services/CloudWatch\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIK9J8FDLDPNLXCK3CK&Action=ListMetrics&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2015-06-17T14%3A30%3A22Z&Version=2010-08-01' 2015-06-17 07:30:22,007 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: /G72RObWf8YzfDxhQZhjEpiaFzCk28Y+WIjZjDtnzAI= 2015-06-17 07:30:22,007 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request method: POST 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request url: http://10.111.5.63:8773/services/CloudWatch 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request header: Content-Length: 215 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request header: Host: 10.111.5.63:8773 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.2.0-pre1-65-gb4d4d07 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.3.3.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.3 requests/1.1.0 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: AWSAccessKeyId: AKIK9J8FDLDPNLXCK3CK 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: Action: ListMetrics 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: Signature: /G72RObWf8YzfDxhQZhjEpiaFzCk28Y+WIjZjDtnzAI= 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: SignatureVersion: 2 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: Timestamp: 2015-06-17T14:30:22Z 2015-06-17 07:30:22,013 DEBUG CloudWatch request data: Version: 2010-08-01 2015-06-17 07:30:22,178 DEBUG CloudWatch response time: 0.164 seconds 2015-06-17 07:30:22,178 ERROR CloudWatch response status: 403 2015-06-17 07:30:22,179 DEBUG CloudWatch response header: content-length: 291 2015-06-17 07:30:22,179 DEBUG CloudWatch response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2015-06-17 07:30:22,180 DEBUG ListMetrics -- response content -- SenderUnauthorizedOperationYou are not authorized to perform this operation.e0b60b69-2104-4f92-b0a4-8bcc8d8ee7ec 2015-06-17 07:30:22,181 DEBUG ListMetrics -- end of response content -- 2015-06-17 07:30:22,181 INFO ListMetrics result: failure euwatch-list-metrics: error (UnauthorizedOperation): You are not authorized to perform this operation. Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/euwatch-list-metrics", line 5, in pkg_resources.run_script('euca2ools==3.2.0-pre1-65-gb4d4d07', 'euwatch-list-metrics') File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 461, in run_script self.require(requires)[0].run_script(script_name, ns) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 1194, in run_script execfile(script_filename, namespace, namespace) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_pre1_65_gb4d4d07-py2.6.egg/EGG-INFO/scripts/euwatch-list-metrics", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.monitoring.listmetrics.ListMetrics.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_pre1_65_gb4d4d07-py2.6.egg/euca2ools/commands/monitoring/listmetrics.py", line 47, in main return PaginatedResponse(self, (None,), ('Metrics',)) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/response.py", line 22, in __init__ self.fetch_next_page() # get an initial response File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/response.py", line 31, in fetch_next_page response = self.request.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 180, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 167, in send auth=self.auth) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 198, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_pre1_65_gb4d4d07-py2.6.egg/euca2ools/commands/monitoring/__init__.py", line 55, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (403, 'UnauthorizedOperation', 'UnauthorizedOperation', 'You are not authorized to perform this operation.') {code}
